Tucson merely plays along and bows respectfully to Big Convoy.  He had not =
known the Maximal but thought it best to listen to him as if he were Master=
 Yokitron himself.  He then transforms into robot mode, giving his trainer =
the utmost of attention.  Unlike the hot rods of the Autobot faction, he wa=
s and is always a bot of sheer discipline, as he was brought up vorns ago b=
y the famous Autobot CMO.  Ratchet's influence shows through Tucson in expr=
ession, intellect and body language, even though he has no idea of his gene=
tic ties to him.  So it is with great focus that Tucson looks onto his ment=
or, and a maturity that often does not come with a Prime as young as himsel=
f.

" If you're concerned about ill behavior on my part, I assure you that =
you will see none of that from me.  I know how it feels to work in the shad=
ows of insolence and I myself am not a fan of it.  My name is Tucson Prime.=
  I started as an Autobot, but was later upgraded to a Prime and then to a =
Maximal Prime. "

He takes a military stance and salutes Big Convoy respect=
fully.  His vocal tone nearly matching that of Ratchet's.

" I'm ready Sir.=
"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Sep 26, 2011, at 9:36 =
AM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > With=
 amazing calm Tucson just simply walks by them and ignores their taunts.
> =
> He had a feeling he was expected to lash out in draconic rage which would=

> > cloud his train of thought, thus making him more vulnerable to failure=
.
> > Instead, he stumbles upon a discarded bone, rather thick in size and =
simply
> > snaps it with a whip of the tip of his tail, swiping it away and=
 shattering
> > it into a thousand bone fragments. He then simply shrugs wi=
th his front
> > haunches.
> >
> > " Excuse me, but that bone was in my way=
. "
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> The hooting and catcalling continued as TUSCON was led =
down the
> walkways, if anyone noticed the bone breaking manuver, there was=
 no
> visible or audial sign of it.
> 
> As TUSCON moved he could see that =
there were aliens of different
> types, but also machine life forms as well=
. And it was towards these
> that he was led, a large door parting to let t=
hem in. The guards that
> let them in carefully kept their weapons on the r=
eady as they passed
> through.
> 
> GUILEDART stopped as he opened the last=
 gate and gestured to TUSCON,
> "This is where you will stay as you prepare=
 for your battles." He
> pointed for him to go inside. "Your . . . " He pau=
sed as if looking
> for the proper word and then finally found one. " . . .=
 your trainer
> will be inside."
> 
> Approaching the gate from the other s=
ide was a large and imposing
> figure of seemingly massive proportions. A f=
ew inches shorter than
> TUSCON himself he was thick at the shoulders and h=
ips, huge horns of
> some type jutting out.
> 
> It was the Maximal known a=
s BIG CONVOY!
> 
> A CONVOY!?!? The Convoy ranks higher than a Prime but le=
ss than a
> Magnus. There are very few Convoys, and they are considered to =
be flag
> rank and are typically used to assist the Magnus in his duties.
>=
 
> But what was BIG doing out here? Could this be one of the 'other'
> rea=
sons that LEO PRIME is out here, to look for BIG CONVOY, he was
> rumored t=
o be a close friend of LIO CONVOY.
> 
> "Another one." He grumbled under hi=
s breath as he looked at TUSCON.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Tucson merely plays along and bows res=
pectfully to Big Convoy.  He had not known the Maximal but thought it =
best to listen to him as if he were Master Yokitron himself.  He then =
transforms into robot mode, giving his trainer the utmost of attention. &nb=
sp;Unlike the hot rods of the Autobot faction, he was and is always a bot o=
f sheer discipline, as he was brought up vorns ago by the famous Autobot CM=
O.  Ratchet's influence shows through Tucson in expression, intellect =
and body language, even though he has no idea of his genetic ties to him. &=
nbsp;So it is with great focus that Tucson looks onto his mentor, and a mat=
urity that often does not come with a Prime as young as himself.</div><div>=
<br></div><div>" If you're concerned about ill behavior on my part, I assur=
e you that you will see none of that from me.  I know how it feels to =
work in the shadows of insolence and I myself am not a fan of it.  My =
name is Tucson Prime.  I started as an Autobot, but was later upgraded=
 to a Prime and then to a Maximal Prime. "</div><div><br></div><div>He take=
s a military stance and salutes Big Convoy respectfully.  His vocal to=
ne nearly matching that of Ratchet's.</div><div><br></div><div>" I'm ready =
Sir."</div><div><br>Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. </div=
><div><br>On Sep 26, 2011, at 9:36 AM, Super Cyclonus <<a href=3D"mailto=

    <div id=3D"ygrp-text">
      
      
      <p>>=
 <OLD><br>
><br>
> With amazing calm Tucson just simply walks b=
y them and ignores their taunts.<br>
>  He had a feeling he was expected=
 to lash out in draconic rage which would<br>
> cloud his train of thoug=
ht, thus making him more vulnerable to failure.<br>
> Instead, he stumbl=
es upon a discarded bone, rather thick in size and simply<br>
> snaps it=
 with a whip of the tip of his tail, swiping it away and shattering<br>
&gt=
; it into a thousand bone fragments.  He then simply shrugs with his front<=
br>
> haunches.<br>
><br>
> " Excuse me, but that bone was in my w=
ay. "<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
The hooting and catcalling continued as=
 TUSCON was led down the<br>
walkways, if anyone noticed the bone breaking =
manuver, there was no<br>
visible or audial sign of it.<br>
<br>
As TUSCON =
moved he could see that there were aliens of different<br>
types, but also =
machine life forms as well. And it was towards these<br>
that he was led, a=
 large door parting to let them in. The guards that<br>
let them in careful=
ly kept their weapons on the ready as they passed<br>
through.<br>
<br>
GUI=
LEDART stopped as he opened the last gate and gestured to TUSCON,<br>
"This=
 is where you will stay as you prepare for your battles." He<br>
pointed fo=
r him to go inside. "Your . . . " He paused as if looking<br>
for the prope=
r word and then finally found one. " . . . your trainer<br>
will be inside.=
"<br>
<br>
Approaching the gate from the other side was a large and imposin=
g<br>
figure of seemingly massive proportions. A few inches shorter than<br=
>
TUSCON himself he was thick at the shoulders and hips, huge horns of<br>
=
some type jutting out.<br>
<br>
It was the Maximal known as BIG CONVOY!<br>=

<br>
A CONVOY!?!? The Convoy ranks higher than a Prime but less than a<br>=

Magnus. There are very few Convoys, and they are considered to be flag<br>=

rank and are typically used to assist the Magnus in his duties.<br>
<br>
B=
ut what was BIG doing out here? Could this be one of the 'other'<br>
reason=
s that LEO PRIME is out here, to look for BIG CONVOY, he was<br>
rumored to=
 be a close friend of LIO CONVOY.<br>
<br>
"Another one." He grumbled under=
 his breath as he looked at TUSCON.<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
Preston<br>
</p=
